This is really … questionable, for lack of a better term. Considering epoch is always used referring to iterating over the training set once, it is incredibly surprising to see the LR schedulers use it as the training step number (batch counter).

The minimum would be a hint in the documentation. I volunteer to add it if desired.

body:
This is really … questionable, for lack of a better term. Considering `epoch` is _always_ used referring to iterating over the training set once, it is incredibly surprising to see the LR schedulers use it as the training step number (batch counter).

The minimum would be a hint in the documentation. I volunteer to add it if desired.
